choices.C: Configure the allowas-in command on R1.
choices.D: Configure identical confederation ASNs on R1 and R2.
choices.A: Configure R2 as a route reflector client of R1.
choices.B: Configure the next-hop-self command on R2.

questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. An engineer is troubleshooting an issue with this network and notices that prefixes from R3 are missing on the R1 rooting table. Due to repeated ASN, when the 10.0.0.0/8 prefix from R3 arrives at R1, BGP automatically rejects it. There is no prefix-list on R1 which blocks the traffic from R3. What should the engineer do to fix the problem so that BGP allows that prefix on R1?
An engineer wants to map a multicast IP address to a multicast MAC. How many bits are used to make the conversion?

choices.D: It must have an IGP adjacency.
choices.B: It applies SID mappings from one IGP instance to another IGP instance.
choices.C: It must be placed in the core of the network.

questions.question_text: What is a characteristic of a segment routing mapping server?

choices.A: node SID that identifies the network device
choices.B: prefix SID that contains router hops toward the destination
choices.C: adjacency SID that represents a path between the routers
choices.D: binding SID that is used to stitch different domains

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D is correct

Selected Answer: D
D is correct

Selected Answer: D
D is correct

Selected Answer: D
The Binding-SID is fundamental to SR, it provides scaling,
network opacity and service independence

questions.question_text: Which feature provides service independence in service provider networks?
The operator must leverage automated steering and coloring with the design. Which two elements from an SR Policy tuple are used for automated steering inside of the network? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AD
SR Policy is unique identifiered by tuple with "head-end, color and end-point". But endpoint and color is required at least

Form same RFC
The endpoint and the color are used to automate the steering of service or transport routes on SR Policies

Correct. 

 The endpoint and the color are used to automate the steering of
 service or transport routes on SR Policies (refer to Section 8).

https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/rfc9256/
